statements: INSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, release_date, genre, rating, platform) VALUES ('1', 'Game A', '2021-01-01', 'Action', 4.5, 'PC') ON CONFLICT (game_id) DO UPDATE SET game_name='Game A', release_date='2021-01-01', genre='Action', rating=4.5, platform='PC';

INSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, release_date, genre, rating, platform) VALUES ('2', 'Game B', '2021-02-15', 'Adventure', 4.2, 'PS4') ON CONFLICT (game_id) DO UPDATE SET game_name='Game B', release_date='2021-02-15', genre='Adventure', rating=4.2, platform='PS4';

INSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, release_date, genre, rating, platform) VALUES ('3', 'Game C', '2021-03-30', 'RPG', 4.8, 'Xbox') ON CONFLICT (game_id) DO UPDATE SET game_name='Game C', release_date='2021-03-30', genre='RPG', rating=4.8, platform='Xbox';
UPSERT INTO players (player_id, player_name, player_level) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 5) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE player_name = 'John Doe', player_level = 5;
UPSERT INTO players (player_id, player_name, player_level) VALUES (2, 'Jane Smith', 8) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE player_name = 'Jane Smith', player_level = 8;
UPSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, game_genre) VALUES (1, 'Game A', 'Action') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE game_name = 'Game A', game_genre = 'Action';

UPSERT INTO Player (player_id, player_name, level) VALUES ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', 'Alice', 10) ON CONFLICT (player_id) DO UPDATE SET player_name = EXCLUDED.player_name, level = EXCLUDED.level;

UPSERT INTO Game (game_id, game_name, genre, release_date) VALUES ('223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', 'Game1', 'Action', '2022-10-01') ON CONFLICT (game_id) DO UPDATE SET game_name = EXCLUDED.game_name, genre = EXCLUDED.genre, release_date = EXCLUDED.release_date;

UPSERT INTO Scoreboard (player_id, game_id, score) VALUES ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', 100) ON CONFLICT (player_id, game_id) DO UPDATE SET score = EXCLUDED.score;
INSERT INTO game (id, title, release_date, platform) VALUES (1, 'Game of Thrones', '2021-05-15', 'PC') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = 'Game of Thrones', release_date = '2021-05-15', platform = 'PC';

INSERT INTO player (id, username, email, registration_date) VALUES (1, 'JohnDoe', 'johndoe@example.com', '2021-01-10') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username = 'JohnDoe', email = 'johndoe@example.com', registration_date = '2021-01-10';

INSERT INTO developer (id, name, founded_date, headquarters) VALUES (1, 'ABC Studios', '2010-03-20', 'Los Angeles') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'ABC Studios', founded_date = '2010-03-20', headquarters = 'Los Angeles';
UPSERT INTO players (player_id, player_name, player_level, player_score) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 10, 500) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE player_level = 10, player_score = 500;
UPSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, game_genre, game_release_date) VALUES (1, 'Game A', 'Action', '2022-01-15') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE game_genre = 'Action';
UPSERT INTO achievements (achievement_id, achievement_name, player_id, achievement_date) VALUES (1, 'First Achievement', 1, '2022-01-20') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE achievement_date = '2022-01-20';
